sections.summary: versatile bilingual electronics and instrumentation engineer with multi industry experience of + 9 years demonstrated ability to lead an engineering team, and handle multiple projects from conceptualization through fabrication with high accuracy and in a timely manner. highlights fluent in spanish strong decision maker autocad and sap user work well under pressure python and labview training initiative to work independently asme and osha training eit license in process
